Reviews.Content: central physical location bare amenities extremely tight eating – 8 people max cappuccino staff friendly – hugo air conditioning fair poor terrible – staff adjust times hotter helped windows breeze safe night clean booked triple – twins folding bed – barely walk – dressers limited store clothes – wardrobe views alley street couple nights location worth test don’t surprised threats call police normal maintenance due frustration threats – recommend american stay family – maybe yourself couple breakfast couple pastries slices salami ham orange apple juice close vatican castle st angel piazza navonna lots noisy construction nearby hotel collection 7 apartment building complex graffitti prevalent walls marked chipped toilet plugged confirmed normal usage hotel manager blamed family charged 150 eu call police didnt pay pleasant
